## MentionExtensionOptions interface

The options passed into a mention

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MentionExtensionOptions extends MarkExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [appendText](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.appendtext.md) | <code>string</code> | Text to append after the mention has been added. |
|  [decorationsTag](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.decorationstag.md) | <code>keyof HTMLElementTagNameMap</code> | Tag which wraps an active match |
|  [keyBindings](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.keybindings.md) | <code>SuggestionKeyBindingMap</code> | An object that describes how certain key bindings should be handled.<!-- -->Return <code>true</code> to prevent any further prosemirror actions or return <code>false</code> to allow prosemirror to continue. |
|  [matchers](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.matchers.md) | <code>OptionalSuggestionMatcher[]</code> | Provide a custom matcher with options |
|  [mentionClassName](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.mentionclassname.md) | <code>string</code> | Provide customs class names for the completed mention |
|  [suggestionClassName](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.suggestionclassname.md) | <code>string</code> | Class name to use for the decoration (while the plugin is still being written) |
|  [tag](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.tag.md) | <code>keyof HTMLElementTagNameMap</code> | Provide a custom tag for the mention |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onChange(params)](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.onchange.md) | Called when a suggestion is active and has changed. |
|  [onCharacterEntry(params)](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.oncharacterentry.md) | Called for each character entry and can be used to disable certain characters. |
|  [onExit(params)](./extension-mention.mentionextensionoptions.onexit.md) | Called when a suggestion is exited with the pre-exit match. Can be used to force the command to run e.g. when no match was found but a hash should still be created this can be used to call the command parameter and trigger the mention being created. |
